text: The VinFast LUX A2.0 is a Executive car made by VinFast from 2019 to 2022. == History and Features == The VinFast LUX A2.0 was shown alongside the VinFast LUX SA2.0 at the Paris Motor in 2018.VinFast LUX A2.0 sedan and LUX SA2.0 SUV debut in Paris – BMW-based models to go on sale in June 2019/ the LUX A2.0 is based on the BMW 5 Series (F10).autoevolution: VinFast Scores David Beckham to Unveil BMW-Based Lux Vietnamese Cars – autoevolution, accessdate: 26. May 2019 and was designed by Pininfarina a famous italian design house.Vietnam's Vinfast launches at Paris auto show with pair of rebodied BMWs: Vietnam's Vinfast launches at Paris auto show with pair of rebodied BMWs, accessdate: 26. May 2019 the car has a 2.0 liter turbo BMW petrol engine with a 8-speed automatic transmission. == Markets == The VinFast LUX A2.0 was sold mainly in The Vietnamese market during its production but it was also introduced in Russia in 2018. == Discontinuation == The production of The VinFast LUX A2.0 ended in 2022 without a sucessor due to VinFast's focus on electric vehicles. == References == Category:Sedans
title: VinFast LUX A2.0
